suggestions.original: To improve the realism of the artwork, consider adding more detailed textures to the dog's fur to give it a more lifelike appearance. Pay attention to the shading and highlights to create depth and dimension. The ears and collar could benefit from more precise lines and shading to enhance their realism. The pillow and kennel should have more detailed textures and shadows to make them appear more three-dimensional.
